page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS TO AUTHORS
page.content:
29.07.85 Aylestone School, HEREFORD.
Grateful thanks are due to the following for their contributions to the recording of this survey.
Mrs P. Platts for her informative work on the village of Lugwardine.
Miss J. Richards for her detailed account of the ecology of the flood plain of the River Lugg.
Mr N.C.Jeffries for notes on the Hereford and Gloucester Canal and the Preservation Society of this Canal.
My daughters,Joanna,Ada, and Celia, for their enthusiasm and support.
B. C. Dukes.
